name: Pack opening
description:
This pack opening mechanic is very simple. You have a chest which is what you open to gain cards, and then, an album where the cards are saved. Like in any other pack opening there are different type of cards which have different odds in order to show up. 

Type of crads:

There are four type of crads:


Album:

The album is where you save your collection. You can also reorder your cards the way you like.
